sense.gloss: kind, sort, type, class, genus, order, family
marine products, seafood, fish and shellfish
to be similar (to), to be akin (to), to be like
pulse (edible seeds of various leguminous crops), plant yielding pulse
several types, several kinds, several species
to be equal to, to be as good as, to be a match for, to rival
quasi-synonym (word that has a similar meaning to another, but is not interchangeable)

sdata.j: ↑世↑↓よ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には10↑種類↑↓しゅるい↓の↑人間↑↓にんげん↓がいる。↑二進法↑↓にしんほう↓が↑分↑↓わ↓かる↑者↑↓もの↓と↑分↑↓わ↓からない↑者↑↓もの↓だ。
sdata.e: There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.
